data.title: Hamster Pro Duo SC/PIV
data.meta_description: SecuGen Hamster Pro Duo SC/PIV is a FBI FIPS 201 certified fingerprint scanner with PIV compliant contact smart card reader.
data.text:
Hamster Pro Duo SC/PIV is an FBI certified two-factor authentication system from SecuGen. It uses a contact-less smart card reader and a biometric fingerprint sensor for user identification and authentication purposes. Certified by the FBI for meeting FIPS 201 criteria and mobile ID FAP 20 requirements, Pro Duo can be used for national ID programs, Personal identity verification and user authentication applications.

Pro Duo SC/PIV uses SecuGenâ€™s latest U20 optical sensor. The device is built for the most rugged environments and operating conditions with hostile lighting. Equipped with an array of features from Auto-On to fake finger rejection, the device is self sufficient and highly reliable when it comes to produce flawless results. Combined with the contact-less smart NFC compliant smart card reader, the Hamster Pro Duo SC/PIV promises a convenient yet reliable security solution.

While PINs and passwords always posing a risk of getting misplaced, lost or used by hackers, biometrics offers a virtually unbeatable security feature.
